title: 10/3/2017 Stuck at Authenticating Issues
body:
> Update 3:30 PM Pacific Time
> Results are looking positive for players being able to log in, so we're considering this resolved for now. Thanks everyone for your patience.
  
______

> Update 2:21 PM
> We're still investigating potential root cause, but at the moment this does seem to be limited to players on the east coast.

At about 1:30 PM Pacific Time our tech team started to notice a decent spike in players getting stuck trying to authenticate or log in to the client. We're aware of the issue and are looking into what's gone wrong. In the meantime, most players have had success using a VPN to solve any authentication problems, but this should only be used as a temporary solution. We will continue updating this issue on the [**Live Incident Breakdown Post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/live-incident-breakdown-na/3EVNI0ag-1032017-stuck-at-authenticating-isssues)!

EDIT: This issue shouldn't kick anyone out of games since this is only affecting authentication. If you were disconnected mid game, try some of the basic troubleshooting steps in our connection guide first and then we can dive deeper with you one on one!

replies.body: My entire day off  has been spent trying to fix my client because I cant log in... I have uninstalled/reinstalled, client repaired, and even changed my password... I got kicked out randomly during champ select... and will now have a time penalty... {{sticker:sg-shisa}}
Yeah I was in a ranked game champion select and I got randomly disconnected. I'm using ethernet and should have no problem running league since the last time I ran it was yesterday.
I didn't have this issue until today. Tried a bunch of fixes but nothing has worked so far. Any extra help would be most appreciated! Thanks!
I just came home from a 72-hour heart surgery and now I can't even play league. Please fix it while I sleep for 42 minutes.
